name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3rd Generation 5th Anniversary Live 「Square of Magic!」【#3期生5周年LIVE】 [ZoTCTkD5VBI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Zenhōkō Bishōjo' (全方向美少女) by Houshou Marine.
MC section where the Hololive 3rd generation members talk about the performance.
Duet performance of the song 'Banshanka' (晩餐歌) by Shiranui Flare and Houshou Marine.

subtitles.original: ふふ、後ろ姿みたいで笑えば...
subtitles.english: Hehe, laughing at how I look from behind...

subtitles.original: 夜にも美し怪物...
subtitles.english: A monster beautiful even in the night...

subtitles.original: 女の子で出来上がり
subtitles.english: Finished off as a girl.

subtitles.original: 眉も目も唇も
subtitles.english: Brows, eyes, and lips too,

subtitles.original: 好きなように描き足しな
subtitles.english: draw them in as you like.

subtitles.original: 厚い眼差し重ねなきゃ
subtitles.english: Unless you layer on a thick gaze,

subtitles.original: 千年恋も冷めちゃうわ
subtitles.english: even a thousand-year love will go cold.

subtitles.original: 運命なんて生まれた日より選んだ時決まるもの
subtitles.english: Fate is decided not by birth, but by choice.

subtitles.original: 今も今もひっくるめ今をきっとちゃんと愛してね
subtitles.english: Include everything, and please love me as I am now.

subtitles.original: 正面で見ても横から見ても下から見てもいい女って
subtitles.english: From the front, the side, or from below, a beauty...

subtitles.original: 困っちゃう... (困っちゃう...)
subtitles.english: it's trouble... (it's trouble...)

subtitles.original: 君は全方向美少女
subtitles.english: You're an all-direction beauty.

subtitles.original: ね、困っちゃう... (困っちゃう...)
subtitles.english: Hey, it's trouble... (it's trouble...)

subtitles.original: 中身外見も全部愛して受け取るよ
subtitles.english: I'll love and accept you, inside and out.

subtitles.original: Eyes on you every time I find out you're sweet
subtitles.english: Eyes on you every time I find out you're sweet

subtitles.original: Eyes on you every time I find out you're much more sweet
subtitles.english: Eyes on you every time I find out you're much more sweet

subtitles.original: アイラインを跳ね上げ
subtitles.english: Winged eyeliner flicked up,

subtitles.original: 天まで届くまつ毛
subtitles.english: eyelashes reaching for the sky,

subtitles.original: 頬にバラ咲かせてルージュで嘘を色付けて
subtitles.english: roses blooming on cheeks, coloring lies with rouge.

subtitles.original: よく人に好かれんな
subtitles.english: People often like me,

subtitles.original: 見せ方も分かってます
subtitles.english: I know how to show myself off.

subtitles.original: 美しさも愛嬌も全能力を与えます
subtitles.english: I give my all to beauty and charm.

subtitles.original: 幸福なんて一生をかけてそっとずっと集めるもの
subtitles.english: Happiness is gathered gently over a lifetime.

subtitles.original: 今も今も味わって今をきっとちゃんと愛してね
subtitles.english: Savor every moment, and please love me as I am now.

subtitles.original: 正面で見ても横から見ても下から見てもいい女って
subtitles.english: From the front, the side, or from below, a beauty...

subtitles.original: 困っちゃう... (困っちゃう...)
subtitles.english: it's trouble... (it's trouble...)

subtitles.original: 君は全方向美少女
subtitles.english: You're an all-direction beauty.

subtitles.original: ね、困っちゃう... (困っちゃう...)
subtitles.english: Hey, it's trouble... (it's trouble...)

subtitles.original: 中身外見も全部愛して受け取って
subtitles.english: Love and accept me, inside and out.

subtitles.original: Eyes on you every time I find out you're much more sweet
subtitles.english: Eyes on you every time I find out you're much more sweet

subtitles.original: I find you're much more much more sweet
subtitles.english: I find you're much more much more sweet

subtitles.original: 君は全方向美少女
subtitles.english: You're an all-direction beauty.

subtitles.original: そろり、そろり、いい女はどこかな～？
subtitles.english: Gently, gently... where is the beauty?~

subtitles.original: はーい、横から見て、下から見て、上から見て...
subtitles.english: Right here! Look from the side, below, and above...

subtitles.original: あれ、忍者じゃない？ちょっと待ってよ
subtitles.english: Wait, aren't you a ninja? Hold on a second.

subtitles.original: 船長！さっき歌ってた人と違うぺこ！めっちゃいい女だと思ったら、なんか喋ってみたら違ったみたいな...
subtitles.english: Captain! You're different from the person singing just now-peko! I thought you were a real beauty, but you're different once you talk...

subtitles.original: ということでね、皆さん、この3期生ライブいかがですか？3期生ライブとか言って、まぁ3期生ライブか、いかがですか？無理やりｗ
subtitles.english: And with that, everyone, how are you enjoying this 3rd Gen Live? Calling it a 3rd Gen Live, well it is one, but how is it? I'm forcing it lol.

subtitles.original: こちらね、マリンが結構ね、割と全体の曲とか演出とか考えたんですけど...
subtitles.english: For this, I, Marine, thought about the overall setlist and staging...

subtitles.original: ありがとうね、天才、最高！
subtitles.english: Thank you! You're a genius, the best!

subtitles.original: ね、このソロ曲なんだけど、でもなんかソロなんだけど、
subtitles.english: Right, about this solo song, even though it's a solo,

subtitles.original: やっぱ3期生全員いる感じは出したくて。
subtitles.english: I really wanted to give the feeling of all 3rd Gen being there.

subtitles.original: 全体的に3期生が常にどっかしら映り込むような感じになるように、そここだわってやりました！
subtitles.english: I focused on making sure the 3rd Gen members were always appearing somewhere throughout!

subtitles.original: 天才！天才です！ありがとう！いい女！
subtitles.english: Genius! You're a genius! Thank you! Beauty!

subtitles.original: あ、よ、よいしょ、下から見て！あ、ちょっと違うかも。もう一回、見てくれてる、見てくれてるよ！
subtitles.english: Ah, yo-heave-ho, look from below! Ah, maybe that's a bit off. One more time, they're watching, they're watching!

subtitles.original: よっ！よっ！ありがとう！みんなありがとう！
subtitles.english: Yo! Yo! Thank you! Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original: よっとなんか、フルコンボだドンみたいなノリがすごいよｗ
subtitles.english: Whoa, that 'Full Combo!' energy is incredible lol.

subtitles.original: はい、そんな感じでね、ちょっと、なんか結構みんなにも合う曲、かつ演出も楽しい感じで考えたので、
subtitles.english: Yeah, so I picked songs that suit everyone and thought of fun staging, so...

subtitles.original: この後もね、全部そういう感じで、どっかしらに、そう、みんな3期生を入れつつ...
subtitles.english: Everything from here on will be like that, with 3rd Gen members popping in somewhere...

subtitles.original: 曲がみんなの声に合っていつつ、
subtitles.english: The songs will match everyone's voices,

subtitles.original: 演出が楽しい感じになるように、こだわって作られているので楽しみに見てください！
subtitles.english: and with fun staging. They were made with care, so please look forward to them!

subtitles.original: 楽しんでいってねー！ということでね、ここからはデュエット曲になります！
subtitles.english: Have fun! And with that, from here on we'll have duet songs!

subtitles.original: え、待って、誰と誰？誰と誰？誰と誰？
subtitles.english: Wait, who's with who? Who's with who? Who's with who?

subtitles.original: マリンと組みたい人！マリンと組も！マリンと組も！
subtitles.english: Anyone who wants to pair with Marine! Let's pair with Marine! Let's pair with Marine!

subtitles.original: ズルい、ズルい、歌いたい、歌いたい、歌いたい...
subtitles.english: No fair, no fair! I want to sing, I want to sing, I want to sing...

subtitles.original: だから、これ、これでいいじゃない、これで。これでいいじゃない、いいじゃない、ということでね...
subtitles.english: So, this, this is fine, right? This. This is good, it's good. And so...

subtitles.original: はい、誰と誰がどんな歌を歌うのか、また他のメンバーが現れることはあるのか。
subtitles.english: Yes, who will sing what song, and will other members appear?

subtitles.original: お楽しみにしていってください！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: フレアちゃん、一緒に歌ってくれるんだもんね。
subtitles.english: Flare-chan, you're singing with me, right?

subtitles.original: じゃないと一緒に歌おうね。歌おうな。イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Of course, let's sing together. Let's do it. Yay!

subtitles.original: じゃあ、みんな、立ち位置について。もたもたしないで。
subtitles.english: Okay, everyone, get to your positions. Don't dawdle.

subtitles.original: はい、立ち位置について。お局さんｗ はい、いいわね。
subtitles.english: Yes, get in position. You're acting like a boss lady lol. Yes, that's good.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから だから一緒にはいれないな
subtitles.english: I'll make you cry, so I can't stay with you.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから 早く忘れてほしいんだ
subtitles.english: I'll make you cry, so I want you to forget me quickly.

subtitles.original: 人間だからね たまには違うものも食べたいね
subtitles.english: I'm only human, I want to eat something different sometimes.

subtitles.original: 君を泣かすから そう君を泣かすから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you cry, yes, I'll make you cry.

subtitles.original: でも味気ないないないんだよね
subtitles.english: But it's so tasteless, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 会いたいたくないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to meet you, do I?

subtitles.original: 君以外会いたくないんだよね
subtitles.english: I don't want to meet anyone but you, do I?

subtitles.original: なんて勝手だね
subtitles.english: How selfish of me.
